name: Keep in Tow
description:
- Controller is Required -

Drag yourself along the ground as you take karmic revenge on the king, using both joysticks to control each hand individually.

Help Playtest: This game is currently being developed and therefore rife with bugs.  The current issue at hand is whether the crunching mechanic works on other computers, as it seems to work fine on mine but another computer had issues.

Please fill out this feedback form after testing/playing the game:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd-_8SPJ9lKmdOOZ0R9Om5MsuISQM_d-5ikMD0u...

Thank you :)

Controls:

- Left Joystick -- Move Left Hand

- Right Joystick -- Move Right Hand

- Left Trigger -- Drag with Left Hand

- Right Trigger -- Drag with Right Hand

-Left Joystick Click, Right Joystick Click, Left Bumper or Right Bumper -- Crunch

Programs Used:

-Game made in Unreal Engine 4

-Pixel art created in Aseprite

-Models created in Maya

-Music created in BeepBox
